events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago, and my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking number doesn't show any updates.
The reported problem is identified as a delivery delay due to late shipping or tracking issues.
A customer service agent has been assigned to assist with the delayed delivery inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order delay. Iâ€™m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the current status of your package?
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and the shipping address is 123 Elm Street, Springfield, IL.
After checking, it appears your package was delayed due to a carrier issue. We can either expedite a replacement shipment or issue a full refund.
Please resend the order as soon as possible. I would prefer to receive the product rather than a refund.
We have processed a priority replacement shipment for your order. You will receive a new tracking number shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your replacement package has arrived and that everything is satisfactory with your order.
I received the replacement today and everything is perfect. Thank you for the prompt support!
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing the case now, but feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
